d1_text:
Npc0137:
ï¿½If one of your friends becomes unconscious,[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½you should visit them at the hospital.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½You should check with the nurse receptionist, and she will release your friend.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½It's a nice thing to remember,[PAUSE 15] but it's all right if you forget.[HALT][END]
